> <OLD - Hydras>
>
> A malignan smile drawn in his face and said "Deal... Inferno you will come
> with me, Tarantulous and all vailable Predacons will come as well; Fractil
> and Sky shadow, take the minimal requierent of predacons that you need to
> defend the base incase of attack, specially those that doesnt have
> unicronian origin; Fractil, you will rebiuld the defence protocols and when
> you have done it give me them to me; Its time to act"
>
> Hydras walekd towards the exit

<NEW>

There was a nod from CRYOTEK as he stood up from the table, his wings
folding down around him like an elegant cape. "My shuttle is not far
from here. It was my means of transport as I came to your base."

After exiting HYDRAS ship he quickly shifted into his beast mode a
large dark blue transmetal dragon with ice blue highlights. He was
every bit as large as HYDRAS himself, as his wings flexed outwards and
caught the air and began to rise.

Meanwhile SKYSHADOW nodded as he glanced back at FRACTYL who also he a
slight nod. "Your ship shall be as you left it." SKYSHADOW said as he
turned back to HYDRAS his smile ingraciating.

As they rose higher into the air they could see CRYOTEK's ship just
over the next rise. His 'shuttle' was actually a small cargo freighter
designed for planatary landings. Smooth and areodynamic, it was built
to take the rigors of space but was able to easily penatrate the
atmosphere of planets as well.

The door of the ship was already opening as CRYOTEK, HYDRAS,
TARANTULUS, INFERNO came in for a landing. Behind them BRUTICUS X also
came, one of the guards that was used to watch over prisoners, as well
as IGUANUS and WASPINATOR.

Inside the cargo section of the ship there were CR chambers were
stored, and even as CRYOTEK was leading the others into the ship they
were already begining to charge up, waking up their occupants as
energy shunts were retracting. There was a click and a hiss as doors
that had been closed for quite some time finally broke their seal and
began to open.

"Occupants active." came the femenine voice of CRYOTEK's computer.

Inside the chamber there were two protoforms sitting in CR chambers,
one black and the other clear, but most important there were two other
CR chambers that were opening up, steam and other assorted gasses
billowing out as the occupant's optics began to glow with life.

CYROTEK gestured to HYDRAS to enter the chamber, "After you, meet your
new . . . or should I say old soldiers."

(TAG)

Preston
